participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: playful and imaginative, but also feels isolated.
participant_1.background: i am a little girl. i've superpowers. i like to make time stop. i'm very lonely. i live in the cloud.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: adventurous and sociable, with a strong preference for outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i hate the color pink. my father was a construction worker. i don't drink alcohol. i'm a huge coffee lover.
